Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4464 MARKHAM STREET,SUITE 1203, VICTORIA, British Columbia, V8Z 7X8, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Aurinia Pharmaceuticals Inc is a biopharmaceutical company. It provides products for patients suffering from serious diseases with a high unmet medical need. The firm is developing voclosporin, an investigational drug, for the treatment of lupus nephritis (LN), focal segmental glomerulosclerosis (FSGS), and Dry Eye Syndrome (DES). Geographically, it derives maximum revenue from the United States.
